comments.body: If you use `///` instead of `//` for these comments, they'll show up on the docs.flutter.io web site.
I changed to the normal comments when I made the classes private. Does the doc generator already know to skip private classes and methods?
Oh, I didn't notice that.  Yes, the doc generator knows how to skip private classes and methods.  If its private, I'm not sure it matters which kind of comment we use.  Sorry for the noise.
